name: WordSmith
0:
”Alexa, open word smith”
”Add A at the beginning”
”Spell the current word”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word smith
des:
WordSmith is an adaptation of paper and pencil word game called Lexicant.

Each player takes turns adding a letter either to the beginning or the end of this ever-growing word stem. Any word-stem a player creates must form part of a valid English word, without actually being a word itself. The first player to create a word (with at least three or four letters) loses.

Phrases you can use with WordSmith:
"Start game with one player" - Play WordSmith with Alexa
"Start game with two players" - Play WordSmith with another person
"Add letter A to the beginning"
"Add letter P to the end"
"Spell the current stem"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
